content:
What if we add Ctr+k shortcut key in compose message shortcut keys for adding link to text ?
What are the suggestions?
Ctrl+K is a common shortcut in many other chat applications (slack, discord, gitter too I think) for quick switcher.
I think something else would be nice.

What about Ctr+l then?
Not just for link, but we can create shortcuts for every compose message markdown(like quote, code, bold). And it will be more user friendly if we use same shortcut keys which is use generally for markdown.
If it become too complex(with other shortcuts), then we should not implement this.

@Yashashvi Dave I think adding keyboard shortcuts for bold/italics/etc. there would be a great project. But we do need to be careful about overriding things like ctrl-L that do something in a browser by default.
I also think we should add a ctrl+K sort of thing. Even making it just focus search (same as /) even if you have compose open would be useful.
